name: Leonardo
biography: Leonardo DiCaprio is an American actor, film producer, and environmental activist. He has received various accolades throughout his career, including an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in The Revenant (2015). DiCaprio has been a prominent figure in the film industry since the early 1990s.

name: Joseph
biography: Joseph Gordon-Levitt is an American actor, filmmaker, singer, and entrepreneur. He rose to prominence for his role in the television series 3rd Rock from the Sun (1996–2001), and has since starred in various successful films like (500) Days of Summer, Inception, and The Dark Knight Rises.

name: Elliot
biography: Ellen Page is a Canadian actress and producer. She started her career in Canada with roles in television shows, and her breakthrough came with the film Hard Candy (2005). Page gained international recognition for her role in Juno (2007), earning her nominations for an Academy Award, a BAFTA Award, and a Golden Globe Award.

name: Christian
biography: Christian Bale is an English actor who is known for his intense method acting style. He has received various awards, including an Academy Award and a Golden Globe Award. Bale is best known for his roles in films such as The Dark Knight trilogy, American Psycho, and The Fighter.

name: Heath
biography: Heath Ledger was an Australian actor and director. He gained recognition for his roles in Brokeback Mountain and The Dark Knight, the latter of which earned him a posthumous Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. Ledger's untimely death in 2008 was a great loss to the film industry.

name: Aaron
biography: Aaron Eckhart is an American actor who has appeared in a variety of film and television roles. He is best known for his performances in films such as Thank You for Smoking, The Dark Knight, and Sully. Eckhart has received critical acclaim for his versatile acting skills.

name: Matthew
biography: Matthew McConaughey is an American actor and producer known for his laid-back, charismatic style. He gained fame for his roles in films such as Dazed and Confused, Dallas Buyers Club (which earned him an Academy Award), and Interstellar. McConaughey is also recognized for his work in television and philanthropy.

name: Anne
biography: Anne Hathaway is an American actress and singer. She is known for her roles in films such as The Princess Diaries, Les Misérables (for which she won an Academy Award), and The Dark Knight Rises. Hathaway has also been involved in stage productions and is an advocate for various social causes.

name: Jessica
biography: Jessica Chastain is an American actress and producer. She has gained recognition for her performances in films such as The Help, Zero Dark Thirty, and Molly's Game. Chastain is known for her advocacy of gender equality in Hollywood and has received several accolades for her contributions to the film industry.

name: Sam
biography: Sam Worthington is an Australian actor best known for his roles in films like Avatar, Terminator Salvation, and Clash of the Titans. With his rugged on-screen presence, Worthington has become a notable figure in the action and science fiction genres.

name: Zoe
biography: Zoe Saldana is an American actress and producer. She is known for her versatile roles in films such as Avatar, Guardians of the Galaxy, and Star Trek. Saldana has been praised for breaking barriers in Hollywood and her advocacy for diversity in the entertainment industry.

name: Sigourney
biography: Sigourney Weaver is an American actress best known for her iconic roles in science fiction films such as Alien, Aliens, and Avatar. With a career spanning several decades, Weaver is celebrated for her contributions to the film industry and her portrayal of strong and memorable characters.

name: Tim
biography: Tim Robbins is an American actor, director, and producer. He gained acclaim for his roles in films such as The Shawshank Redemption, Mystic River, and Bull Durham. In addition to his acting career, Robbins has been involved in directing and has been recognized for his contributions to both film and theater.

name: Morgan
biography: Morgan Freeman is an American actor, producer, and narrator. He has received various accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in Million Dollar Baby. Freeman is known for his distinctive voice and has been involved in numerous iconic films throughout his extensive career.

name: Bob
biography: Bob Gunton is an American actor known for his roles in films such as The Shawshank Redemption, Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, and Glory. With a career spanning over four decades, Gunton has made significant contributions to the entertainment industry.

name: Keanu
biography: Keanu Reeves is a Canadian actor, producer, and musician. He gained fame for his roles in films such as The Matrix trilogy, John Wick series, and Speed. Reeves is known for his humility and versatility, earning him a dedicated fan base and respect in the film industry.

name: Laurence
biography: Laurence Fishburne is an American actor, producer, and playwright. He is best known for his roles in The Matrix trilogy, Apocalypse Now, and The Shawshank Redemption. Fishburne's distinguished career spans film, television, and theater, earning him critical acclaim and industry recognition.

name: Carrie-Anne
biography: Carrie-Anne Moss is a Canadian actress known for her roles in The Matrix trilogy, Memento, and Jessica Jones. With a successful career in both film and television, Moss has established herself as a versatile and talented performer in the entertainment industry.

name: Christopher
biography: Best known for his cerebral, often nonlinear, storytelling, acclaimed writer-director Christopher Nolan was born on July 30, 1970, in London, England. Over the course of 15 years of filmmaking, Nolan has gone from low-budget independent films to working on some of the biggest blockbusters ever made.At 7 years old, Nolan began making short movies with his father's Super-8 camera. While studying English Literature at University College London, he shot 16-millimeter films at U.C.L.'s film society.

name: Jonathan
biography: Attended Loyola Academy in Wilmette, Illinois, graduating in 1994.Graduated from Georgetown University in Washington, D.C. in 1999. Majored in English.Shortly after graduating from Georgetown University, Jonathan Nolan served as a production assistant on Memento (2000).Wrote the short story, Memento Mori, on which the film Memento (2000) is based.Was co-writer, with his brother Christopher Nolan, on The Prestige (2006), The Dark Knight (2008) and The Dark Knight Rises (2012).

name: James
biography: James Francis Cameron was born on August 16, 1954 in Kapuskasing, Ontario, Canada. He moved to the United States in 1971. The son of an engineer, he majored in physics at California State University before switching to English, and eventually dropping out. He then drove a truck to support his screenwriting ambition. He landed his first professional film job as art director, miniature-set builder, and process-projection supervisor on Roger Corman's Battle Beyond the Stars (1980)

name: Frank
biography: Three-time Oscar nominee Frank Darabont was born in a refugee camp in 1959 in Montbeliard, France, the son of Hungarian parents who had fled Budapest during the failed 1956 Hungarian revolution. Brought to America as an infant, he settled with his family in Los Angeles and attended Hollywood High School. His first job in movies was as a production assistant on the 1981 low-budget film, Hell Night (1981), starring Linda Blair.

name: Stephen
biography: Stephen Edwin King was born on September 21, 1947, at the Maine General Hospital in Portland. His parents were Nellie Ruth (Pillsbury), who worked as a caregiver at a mental institute, and Donald Edwin King, a merchant seaman. His father was born under the surname Pollock, but used the last name King, under which Stephen was born. He has an older brother, David. The Kings were a typical family until one night, when Donald said he was stepping out for cigarettes and was never heard from again.

name: Lana
biography: Lana Wachowski and her sister Lilly Wachowski, also known as the Wachowskis, are the duo behind such ground-breaking movies as The Matrix (1999) and Cloud Atlas (2012). Born to mother Lynne, a nurse, and father Ron, a businessman of Polish descent, Wachowski grew up in Chicago and formed a tight creative relationship with her sister Lilly. After the siblings dropped out of college, they started a construction business and wrote screenplays. Their 1995 script, Assassins (1995), was made into a movie.

name: Lilly
biography: Director, writer, and producer Lilly Wachowski was born in 1967 in Chicago, the daughter of Lynne, a nurse and painter, and Ron, a businessman. Lilly was educated at Kellogg Elementary School in Chicago, before moving on to Whitney M. Young High School. After graduating from high school, she attended Emerson College in Boston but dropped out.Lilly teamed up with her older sibling, Lana Wachowski, and began working on films. Their first script was optioned and formed the basis for the film Assassins (1995).
